meanings.definition: A group of toxic chemicals used as insecticides.
meanings.sent1: The farmers sprayed the crops with toxaphenes to kill the bugs.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of toxaphenes on the environment.
meanings.sent3: The ants threw a party in the garden until the toxaphenes arrived.
meanings.sent4: The presence of toxaphenes in the water was a silent threat to the ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The smell of toxaphenes lingered in the air, warning of danger.
